thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 67 of 3256
thread.title: Laureen Fisher

author: Laureen Fisher
title: Laureen Fisher
text: I recently rented with rentalcars.com, not only was it easy but a huge savings over everyone else. They did not require my credit card, in fact the ease of it seemed to good to be true so I followed up with the actual rental company and my reservation was exactly as they said it would be within minutes. I have already referred them to several of my friends
